cancellationPolicies.label: Deposit Only rates
cancellationPolicies.description: This property has a 0 day cancellation policy. Failure to cancel within this time will result in a cancellation charge equal to the first night of your stay, unless otherwise stated (see 'Things to Note' information).

privates.name: Superior 2 Bed Apartment Ensuite
privates.description: In order to secure a Private Room, you will need to book the entire room.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

privates.name: Standard 2 Bed Apartment Ensuite
privates.description: In order to secure a Private Room, you will need to book the entire room.
privates.labelDescription: Located on the first floor this compact studio is recommend for a couple staying a few nights or a single guest.  The combined living area includes a Sony LED television, full size kitchen, fridge and coffee machine.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only

Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

privates.labelDescription: Located on the ground floor, this compact studio is ideal for couples staying a few nights or single guests. The combined living area and bedroom feature a 50â€ Sony LED television, a full-size kitchen with a coffee machine, microwave, and dishwasher.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

freeCancellation.label: Free Cancellation rates
freeCancellation.description: If you cancel your booking before 23:59 18th Oct 2025 (AEDT) your deposit will be refunded to your payment card. If you cancel after 23:59 18th Oct 2025 (AEDT) or in the event of a no-show, your deposit will not be refunded and the total of the first night's accommodation will be charged to your payment card, unless otherwise stated (see 'Things to Note' information). Please note that cancellations must be made directly within your booking in My Account.
